content.body: FYI I've been thinking about a couple process questions, and made Reflector posts with proposals for them, at https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/360#issuecomment-1274637026 and https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/451 . The idea is to discuss at the next TC39 meeting, but any help in advance to refine these in advance would be appreciated.
